# Lectures on Riemannian Geometry

**GE Jian**  
*Beijing Normal University*  
[jge@bnu.edu.cn](mailto:jge@bnu.edu.cn)

<br>

This website hosts the lecture notes for the course on Riemannian Geometry. The material covers fundamental concepts including connections, curvature, geodesics, and global analysis.

## Course Overview

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}
### Part I
**Foundations**  
Manifolds, Tensors, and Riemannian Metrics.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}
### Part II
**Curvature**  
Levi-Civita connections, Geodesics, and Curvature Tensors.
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-4}
### Part III
**Global Geometry**  
Comparison Theorems, Submanifolds, and Variational formulas.
:::

:::
